about_the_game:
Maze Bounders is a rogue-like deck-builder that empowers you to carve out your own path through the twists and turns of the Maze. 

Every Great Maze Needs a Great Adventurer

Since time immemorial, the ever-changing walls of the Maze have attracted those brave enough to risk life and limb for glory—and a bit of gold). Now it's your turn, so grab your sword and venture out of your sleepy town into the unknown. 

Limitless Options, Limitless Playthroughs

Discover dozens of pieces of equipment and 100s of cards unique to each character as you as you battle your way through the Maze's stages. Back in town, unlock powerful objects, cards and characters before venturing out again. 

Variability Built Into Every Step  

The Maze shifts each time you enter: enemies, elites and bosses change, new events emerge and rare challengers appear. You'll never land between the same two walls twice.

name: Maze Bounders
short_description: Uncover the secrets at the heart of the Maze as you assemble a powerful arsenal of cards and mystical objects in this deck-building rogue-like adventure.
